La api no crea un nuevo chat?
No.
Debe agregar alguna variable de contexto?

Requerimos un template?
Sí, es probable que pase más de 24 horas.
Requerimos un api Key o es interna del bot? (se expone a cliente)
API, con una key del template y bot

text:
:writing_hand: :dart: Data: Team, tenemos una tabla de usuarios para kriator filtrando el código de perfil: *Tbl Ibot Users + Tbl Ibot Users* 
```SELECT "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."id" AS "id", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."idreg_fk_perfil" AS "idreg_fk_perfil", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."idreg_fk_customer" AS "idreg_fk_customer", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."user_name" AS "user_name", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."name" AS "name", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."mood" AS "mood", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."mobile" AS "mobile", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."home" AS "home", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."office" AS "office", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."about_me" AS "about_me", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."country_region" AS "country_region", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."city" AS "city", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."comuna" AS "comuna", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."website" AS "website", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."gender" AS "gender", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."birthdate" AS "birthdate", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."password" AS "password", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."language" AS "language", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."password_v2" AS "password_v2", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."first_time" AS "first_time", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."tutorial" AS "tutorial", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."account_sid" AS "account_sid", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."auth_token" AS "auth_token", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."ghost_user" AS "ghost_user", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."empresa" AS "empresa", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."photo" AS "photo", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."licencia" AS "licencia", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."user_mail" AS "user_mail", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."user_mail_gmail" AS "user_mail_gmail", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."consentimiento" AS "consentimiento", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."fecha_con" AS "fecha_con", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."active" AS "active", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."audit_fec_first_time" AS "audit_fec_first_time", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."audit_log_ins" AS "audit_log_ins", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."audit_fec_ins" AS "audit_fec_ins", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."audit_log_udp" AS "audit_log_udp", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."audit_fec_udp" AS "audit_fec_udp", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."landing_page" AS "landing_page"
FROM "public"."tbl_ibot_users"
WHERE "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."idreg_fk_perfil" = 4
ORDER BY "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."fecha_con" DESC
LIMIT 1048575```
Podemos dejar que solo sea tabla para kriator, no sea reutlizable ni tenga registros de algo más? (No con filtros, poder tener una tabla en específico para kriator/usuarios)?

Tbl Ibot Users + Tbl Ibot Users

SELECT "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."id" AS "id", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."idreg_fk_perfil" AS "idreg_fk_perfil", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."idreg_fk_customer" AS "idreg_fk_customer", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."password_v2" AS "password_v2", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."first_time" AS "first_time", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."tutorial" AS "tutorial", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."account_sid" AS "account_sid", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."auth_token" AS "auth_token", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."ghost_user" AS "ghost_user", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."empresa" AS "empresa", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."photo" AS "photo", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."licencia" AS "licencia", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."user_mail" AS "user_mail", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."user_mail_gmail" AS "user_mail_gmail", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."consentimiento" AS "consentimiento", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."fecha_con" AS "fecha_con", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."active" AS "active", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."audit_fec_first_time" AS "audit_fec_first_time", "public"."tbl_ibot_users"."audit_log_ins" AS "audit_log_ins", FROM "public"."tbl_ibot_users"

LIMIT 1048575
Podemos dejar que solo sea tabla para kriator, no sea reutlizable ni tenga registros de algo más? (No con filtros, poder tener una tabla en específico para kriator/usuarios)?
